## `GetHistogramIntervalDisplay`

Returns how bin (axis) labels are displayed on histograms\index{graphs!histograms} for new projects.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
IntervalDisplay GetHistogramIntervalDisplay()
```

### Return value {-}

Type: [`IntervalDisplay`](#intervaldisplay)
:::
